ComicInfo.Series: Tomb Raider vs. the Wolf-Men: Monster War
ComicInfo.Summary: As Lara travels to Romania to find a cure for Magdalena, she recalls how she found Frankensteinâ€™s body frozen in ice, was nearly killed by Hyde, but was rescued by Dr. Henry Jekyll, now completely separate from the Hyde persona. Once in Romania, Lara battles a pack of Wolf-Men to bring back a necrotic orchid for Dr. Jekyll. In London, a possessed Magdalena escapes from the care of Dr. Jekyll and travels to New York City to rejoin Dracula.
ComicInfo.Title: Lara Croft Tomb Raider vs The Wolf-Men
